The Garmin Fitness plugin is an open source plugin project for !SportTracks.  If you are a developer and want to contribute to this plugin, feel free to contact me by e-mail or on the [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks/Forums/ SportTracks forum] (username PissedOffCil).  Once we get in touch I can create you an SVN account so we can work together.

If you only want to peek into the code, feel free to do so using to command below in you SVN client.

{{{
svn checkout http://garminworkouts.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ garminworkouts-read-only 
}}}

If you are not familiar with SVN and still want to see the code, you can head to the [http://code.google.com/p/garminworkouts/source/browse/trunk depot view] where you can view all the files in the project.

Finally, you can also follow the project's progression by heading to the [http://code.google.com/p/garminworkouts/source/list changes page].  You will find the list of all submitted changelists with their comments so you can see what has been done and what bugs we're fixed.
